neighborhoods.name: Centro Storico
neighborhoods.character: The historic heart of Amalfi, featuring medieval architecture, narrow cobblestone streets, and the magnificent cathedral at its center.

location.description: Located in the heart of Amalfi, centered around Piazza del Duomo and extending through the historic streets.

history.overview: The original medieval settlement of Amalfi, dating back to the 9th century, with well-preserved architecture from the Maritime Republic era.
history.significance: Historic heart of the Amalfi Republic, preserving the authentic character and religious heritage of the town.

transit: Limited vehicle access in narrow streets
practical_info.safety: Very safe with constant foot traffic and good lighting.
practical_info.best_time_to_visit: Morning for cathedral visits, afternoon for shopping, evening for atmosphere.
practical_info.walkability: Good but challenging due to cobblestone streets and some steep sections.

attractions.name: Duomo di Sant'Andrea
attractions.description: Magnificent 9th-century cathedral with stunning Arab-Norman architecture.
attractions.appeal: Essential visit to experience Amalfi's religious and architectural heritage.

attractions.name: Chiostro del Paradiso
attractions.description: Beautiful 13th-century cloister with Moorish-style arches and peaceful garden.
attractions.appeal: Perfect for quiet contemplation and beautiful architecture photography.

attractions.name: Piazza del Duomo
attractions.description: Historic square dominated by the cathedral with surrounding cafés and shops.
attractions.appeal: Heart of Amalfi life and perfect for people-watching.

activities.name: Cathedral Visit
activities.description: Explore the magnificent cathedral and its historic treasures.

activities.name: Historic Walking Tour
activities.description: Discover the medieval streets and learn about Amalfi's rich history.

stay_here_if: You want to be at the heart of Amalfi's history and culture
You prefer walking to major attractions and restaurants
avoid_if: You want to avoid tourist crowds
insider_tips: Visit the cathedral early morning for the best light and fewer crowds.
Many restaurants don't take reservations - arrive early for dinner.
Best photos are taken during golden hour from the cathedral steps.

neighborhoods.name: Marina Grande
neighborhoods.character: Amalfi's vibrant harbor area featuring the main beach, waterfront restaurants, boat tours, and stunning Mediterranean views.

location.description: Located along the waterfront at the base of the historic center, stretching along the harbor and beach.

history.overview: Traditional fishing harbor that has evolved into a modern marina while maintaining its maritime character and historic shipyard.
history.significance: Historic maritime heart of Amalfi, connecting the town to the Mediterranean and other coastal destinations.

practical_info.safety: Very safe with good lighting and regular maritime activity.
practical_info.best_time_to_visit: Morning for beach activities, afternoon for swimming, evening for sunset dining.
practical_info.walkability: Excellent with flat waterfront promenades and good paths.

attractions.name: Spiaggia Grande
attractions.description: Main beach with dark volcanic sand and crystal-clear Mediterranean waters.
attractions.appeal: Perfect for swimming, sunbathing, and enjoying the coastal atmosphere.

attractions.name: Arsenale della Repubblica
attractions.description: 13th-century shipyard now housing maritime history museum.
attractions.appeal: Insight into Amalfi's naval heritage and maritime traditions.

attractions.name: Waterfront Promenade
attractions.description: Scenic walkway along the harbor with views of boats and sea.
attractions.appeal: Ideal for evening strolls and sunset photography.

activities.name: Boat Tours
activities.description: Take boat trips to Capri, Positano, and other coastal destinations.

stay_here_if: You love waterfront views and beach access
You want easy access to boat excursions
You prefer waterfront dining and maritime atmosphere
avoid_if: You want to avoid maritime activity
insider_tips: Book boat tours in advance during peak season.
Waterfront restaurants fill up quickly at sunset - reserve ahead.
Early morning offers the best light for maritime photography.

neighborhoods.name: Via Lorenzo d'Amalfi
neighborhoods.character: The bustling commercial heart of Amalfi, featuring shops, restaurants, and a mix of local and tourist amenities.

location.description: Located parallel to the waterfront, connecting the historic center with the eastern residential areas.

history.overview: Developed as the main commercial artery of Amalfi, connecting the historic center with the harbor and residential areas.
history.significance: Practical heart of daily life in Amalfi, serving both locals and visitors with essential services and shopping.

transit: Walking distance to all major areas
practical_info.safety: Very safe with constant activity and good lighting.
practical_info.best_time_to_visit: Morning for shopping, afternoon for browsing, evening for dining.
practical_info.walkability: Excellent with pedestrian-friendly streets and flat terrain.

attractions.name: Traditional Shops
attractions.description: Local boutiques selling ceramics, limoncello, and traditional crafts.

attractions.name: Tourist Services
attractions.description: Information centers, tour bookings, and practical services.
attractions.appeal: Convenient access to tourist information and services.

activities.name: Shopping Spree
activities.description: Browse local crafts, ceramics, and traditional products.

activities.name: Local Culture Experience
activities.description: Experience authentic local Amalfi life and commerce.

stay_here_if: You want convenient access to shopping and services
You prefer practical amenities and local atmosphere
You want to be central but not in the historic center
avoid_if: You want to avoid commercial activity
insider_tips: Visit shops early morning for best selection and fewer crowds.
Many restaurants offer better prices than waterfront dining.
Local boutiques offer authentic Amalfi products.

neighborhoods.name: Hillside Residential
neighborhoods.character: Quiet residential neighborhoods perched on the hills above Amalfi, offering panoramic views and authentic local life.

location.description: Located on the hills surrounding the historic center, offering elevated views over Amalfi and the Mediterranean.

history.overview: Traditional residential areas that have developed over centuries, maintaining the authentic character of Amalfi beyond the tourist center.
history.significance: Represents the authentic residential side of Amalfi where locals live and work.

practical_info.safety: Very safe residential area with local community presence.
practical_info.best_time_to_visit: Morning for clear vistas, evening for sunset views, any time for local atmosphere.
practical_info.walkability: Challenging due to steep hills, but rewarding for views.

attractions.name: Panoramic Viewpoints
attractions.description: Multiple elevated positions offering stunning views of Amalfi and the coast.
attractions.appeal: Best panoramic views of the town and Mediterranean.

attractions.name: Local Gardens
attractions.description: Beautiful local gardens and landscaping around residential properties.
attractions.appeal: Peaceful green spaces with Mediterranean plants.

attractions.name: Walking Paths
attractions.description: Scenic walking paths connecting residential areas with viewpoints.
attractions.appeal: Perfect for peaceful walks and exercise.

activities.name: Panoramic Photography
activities.description: Capture sweeping views of Amalfi, the coast, and surrounding landscape.

activities.name: Local Culture Experience
activities.description: Experience authentic local Amalfi residential life.

stay_here_if: You want panoramic views and quiet setting
avoid_if: You want to walk to major attractions and restaurants
You prefer beachfront or city center locations
insider_tips: Best panoramic photos are taken during golden hour.
Some residential streets offer surprising viewpoints.
Access by foot recommended for the full local experience.

neighborhoods.name: Eastern Coastal
neighborhoods.character: A quieter coastal area east of the center, featuring beautiful viewpoints, walking paths, and access to the Sentiero degli Dei hiking trail.

location.description: Located east of the historic center, extending along the coast with access to hiking trails and scenic viewpoints.

history.overview: Traditional coastal area that has maintained its natural beauty and access to the famous hiking trails of the Amalfi Coast.
history.significance: Gateway to the natural beauty and hiking opportunities that make the Amalfi Coast famous.

practical_info.safety: Safe area with good paths and regular hiker traffic.
practical_info.best_time_to_visit: Morning for hiking, afternoon for coastal views, sunset for photography.
practical_info.walkability: Good for walking with well-maintained paths and trails.

attractions.name: Sentiero degli Dei Access
attractions.description: Access point to the famous 'Path of the Gods' hiking trail.
attractions.appeal: Perfect for experiencing the stunning coastal hiking trails.

attractions.name: Coastal Viewpoints
attractions.description: Multiple viewpoints offering spectacular coastal and sea views.
attractions.appeal: Best coastal photography opportunities and sunset views.

attractions.name: Scenic Walking Paths
attractions.description: Beautiful coastal paths perfect for peaceful walks.
attractions.appeal: Ideal for nature walks and coastal exploration.

activities.name: Hiking
activities.description: Access to famous hiking trails including Sentiero degli Dei.

activities.name: Coastal Photography
activities.description: Capture stunning coastal views and natural landscapes.

stay_here_if: You love hiking and outdoor activities
You prefer natural beauty over urban amenities
avoid_if: You want easy access to restaurants and shopping
insider_tips: Best hiking conditions are in spring and autumn.
Bring water and proper footwear for hiking trails.
Sunset offers the most spectacular coastal photography.
